data.title: Validate explicit UC need #1 API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Invoice payment with net-30 terms". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
